text: Michal Ranko (born 19 February 1994) is a Slovak football defender, who most recently played for MFK Skalica. ==Club career== ===FC ViOn Zlaté Moravce - Vráble=== Ranko made his professional Fortuna Liga debut for FC ViOn Zlaté Moravce - VrábleFC ViOn Zlaté Moravce - Vráble - AS Trenčín 3:0 30.07.2016, futbalnet.sk against AS Trenčín on 30 July 2016. On 26 July 2018, he signed a contract with Motor Lublin. ==References== ==External links== * Eurofotbal profile * * Futbalnet profile Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FK Dubnica players Category:AFC Nové Mesto nad Váhom players Category:FC ViOn Zlaté Moravce players Category:FK Senica players Category:Motor Lublin players Category:MFK Skalica players Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:Sportspeople from Trenčín
title: Michal Ranko
